docs.snippet: A few vocal parents harnessed the power of Facebook and Twitter to pressure pharmaceutical firm Mylan to lower its price on EpiPens, a life-saving injection for people with severe allergic reactions.

headline.print_headline: Parental Revolt on a Drug Price
headline.main: How Parents Harnessed the Power of Social Media to Challenge EpiPen Prices

docs.abstract: A few vocal parents harnessed the power of Facebook and Twitter to pressure pharmaceutical firm Mylan to lower its price on EpiPens, a life-saving injection for people with severe allergic reactions.

docs.snippet: The United States authorities are expected to announce a settlement with JPMorgan Chase in a bribery case involving the hiring of Chinese leaders’ children.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: JPMorgan Said to Settle Bribery Case, Ending ‘Too Big to Fail,’ Goldman’s Pitch to the Masses

docs.snippet: Once again, the U.S. is faced with a president-elect who has won the electoral votes but not the popular vote.

headline.main: Should the Electoral College Be Abolished?

docs.abstract: Once again, the U.S. is faced with a president-elect who has won the electoral votes but not the popular vote.

docs.snippet: Verizon said its profit fell in its most recent quarter as it added fewer subscribers for its traditional cellphone business. It also said it's still evaluating how the hack at Yahoo affects its $4.8 billion deal for the company.

headline.print_headline: Verizon Still Digesting Yahoo Hack; 3Q Profit Falls
headline.main: Verizon Still Digesting Yahoo Hack; 3Q Profit Falls

docs.snippet: If you were part of Mrs. Clinton’s inner circle, whom would you advise her to choose, and why?
Partnering with CBS, Twitter will stream the Democratic and Republican National Conventions. Both streams will be available to nonusers.

headline.print_headline: Both National Conventions Will Air Live on Twitter
headline.main: Twitter to Live-Stream Both National Conventions

docs.abstract: Twitter will partner with CBS to live stream Democratic and Republican National Conventions; company says it will make stream available to people who have not signed up for service in effort to attract new audience and position itself as live news leader.

docs.snippet: Steps away from Yankee Stadium, BMX enthusiasts have made a welcoming and self-sustaining community.

headline.main: The Brotherhood of Big City BMX

docs.abstract: Steps away from Yankee Stadium, BMX enthusiasts have made a welcoming and self-sustaining community.

docs.snippet: A reporter’s credit card was stolen, so he counted all the video cameras in stores where it was used afterward. And then he included the data from the Uber rides.

headline.print_headline: Many Electronic Eyes, but Who’s Really Watching?
headline.main: A World of Surveillance Doesn’t Always Help to Catch a Thief

docs.abstract: Victim of credit card theft in San Francisco notes local authorities could have easily identified and arrested suspect by examining large number of digital camera recordings in Uber cabs and other businesses patronized by thief.

docs.snippet: Former rugby league player Anthony Mundine has urged Australians to follow the lead set by NFL players in the United States and boycott the national anthem in the grand finals of two local competitions at the weekend.

headline.print_headline: Mundine Backs Anthem Boycott at Australian Finals
headline.main: Mundine Backs Anthem Boycott at Australian Finals

docs.snippet: The venture capitalist is the rare tech figure who openly supports Donald Trump’s candidacy. He is set to address conventiongoers on Thursday.

headline.main: Peter Thiel and the G.O.P. Convention
